EmailTemplate.name: Corp Comm.Bill Cook 12-22-15
EmailTemplate.subject: Make the Most of the Last Days of 2015
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
PIVOTAL FIELD COMMUNICATIONS A Message from Bill Cook Make the Most of the Last Days of 2015 Team,
As we get close to wrapping an awesome year, I want to remind you and your significant other about the great achievementÂ clubs for those who meet their goals.
There is still time left for you to qualify for a club, but it's running out fast. I sincerely hope to see as many of you as possible at both of these amazing venues.
Good luck closing out the year, and I wish you and your family a very happy and peaceful holiday!
With esteem,
